meanings.definition: A person who engages in the act of gammoning.
meanings.sent1: The gammoners gathered around the table for a friendly game.
meanings.sent2: The town had many gammoners who enjoyed playing backgammon.
meanings.sent3: The gammoners couldn't stop laughing at the silly moves they made.
meanings.sent4: In the world of board games, she was a skilled gammoners, always strategizing.
meanings.sent5: The group of gammoners made the game exciting with their competitive spirit.

meanings.sent1: The gammoners in the room were all chatting animatedly.
meanings.sent2: I invited the gammoners to join us for a game night.

meanings.sent4: The gammoners stood out in their colorful outfits at the gaming convention.
meanings.sent5: The gammoners' enthusiasm was contagious, making everyone want to join in.

meanings.sent1: His swift gammoners surprised his opponent and led to victory.
meanings.sent2: The rules of gammoners were explained before the game started.
